metadata.title: CVE-2024-9396 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: It is currently unknown if this issue is exploitable but a condition mayarise where the structured clone of certain objects could lead to memorycorruption. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 131, Firefox ESR < 128.3,Thunderbird < 128.3, and Thunderbird < 131.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
